sentence: According to the New York Post, Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, speaking on Durham's investigation, found credibility in the probe's assertion of spying.
author: Nick Koutsobinas
title: Nunes to Newsmax: Durham Probe Will Bring 'More' Indictments Against Clinton Campaign

sentence: According to the New York Post, Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, speaking on Durham's investigation, found credibility in the probe's allegation of spying.
title: New Video: Devin Nunes Says Durham Probing 'Scam Of The Century'

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, told Newsmax on Tuesday that what the public can divine from Hunter Biden's laptop will depend on Attorney General Merrick Garland, who was nominated by President Joe Biden.
author: Nick Koutsobinas
title: Rep. Jordan to Newsmax: We'll Have to Wait for DOJ Regarding Hunter's Laptop
